alert.note: Alert for Fairfax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 6:49PM EDT until July 16 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of DC and northern Virginia, including the following counties: in DC, District of Columbia. In northern Virginia, Arlington, City of Alexandria, City of Falls Church and Fairfax. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arlington... Alexandria... Springfield... Fort Washington... Fort Hunt... Groveton... Falls Church... Huntington... Coral Hills... Fort Belvoir... Pimmit Hills... Woodbridge... National Harbor... Crystal City... Reagan National Airport... Rosslyn... Nationals Park... Howard University... Gallaudet University... Mclean... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
